entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow late this morning and early this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
